properties.name: Enable Knowledge Consistency Checker (KCC) intra-site topology generation
properties.reason: KCC intra-site topology generation is disabled in your Active Directory environment.
properties.context: The KCC dynamically creates and manages replication connections between Active Directory sites (inter-site links) and within Active Directory sites (intra-site links).
properties.learnMore: For more information: The KCC should be enabled in this site in this forest to generate an optimal replication topology
properties.suggestedActions: Determine why KCC intra-site topology generation was disabled.
